title: Bounce: Reliable High-Dimensional Bayesian Optimization for Combinatorial and Mixed Spaces
abstract: arXiv:2307.00618v2 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: Impactful applications such as materials discovery, hardware design, neural architecture search, or portfolio optimization require optimizing high-dimensional black-box functions with mixed and combinatorial input spaces. While Bayesian optimization has recently made significant progress in solving such problems, an in-depth analysis reveals that the current state-of-the-art methods are not reliable. Their performances degrade substantially when the unknown optima of the function do not have a certain structure. To fill the need for a reliable algorithm for combinatorial and mixed spaces, this paper proposes Bounce that relies on a novel map of various variable types into nested embeddings of increasing dimensionality. Comprehensive experiments show that Bounce reliably achieves and often even improves upon state-of-the-art performance on a variety of high-dimensional problems.

translated_title: Bounce: 可靠的高维贝叶斯优化在组合与混合空间中的应用
translated_abstract: 具有显著影响力的应用，如材料发现、硬件设计、神经架构搜索或组合优化要求优化混合和组合输入空间中的高维黑盒函数。尽管贝叶斯优化在解决这些问题方面取得了显著进展，但深入分析表明目前最先进的方法并不可靠。当函数的未知最优解没有特定结构时，它们的性能会大幅下降。为了满足对组合和混合空间可靠算法的需求，本文提出了一种依赖于将各种变量类型映射为逐渐增加维度的嵌入的新颖映射Bounce。全面的实验表明，Bounce在各种高维问题上可靠地实现并通常甚至超越了最先进的性能。
tldr: 论文提出了一种名为Bounce的算法，通过将不同变量类型映射为逐渐增加维度的嵌入，可在组合和混合输入空间中可靠地优化高维黑盒函数，并在多种高维问题中取得了可靠并且通常优于最先进方法的性能。
en_tdlr: The paper introduces an algorithm called Bounce that reliably optimizes high-dimensional black-box functions in combinatorial and mixed input spaces by mapping different variable types into nested embeddings of increasing dimensionality, achieving reliable and often superior performance to state-of-the-art methods in various high-dimensional problems.
